title: Brilliant experience
text: The VR escape room was unreal! I have done many escape rooms in the past - this was the best by far! I visited here this evening with three friends. We did the Prison Break escape room and it was absolutely fantastic!! The professionalism of the team and VR systems was fabulous! We will definitely be back asap! Thank you so much guys for such a good experience!

title: delicious!!
text: The food is great! We had garlic cheesey pizza bread, calamari, carbonara and seafood linguine! The fopd was delicious! We finished off with desserts which were a little too creamy but tasty. The service was great too! On October, they are doing 50% off meals Monday-Wednesday. We will be back

title: Great
text: This bar is great fun!!! I loved it for my birthday. They have cocktail deals too. The service is great and I would definitely return.

title: fantastic
text: We had a great time at the bottomless brunch. The food was delicious and all staff were friendly. The staff were a little slow with pouring the prosecco. That is the one negative I have. I would definitely return. Thanks guys

title: great fun
text: I went here for my birthday. It was great fun. The drinks and food are great. I would say the drinks are a little expensive...£15 for a double vodka seems a bit steep. Chopse a gin cocktail for £8 The goats cheese salad is a must!!!

title: great
text: Great drinks and service. All staff were friendly and I will be back soon! The strawberry gin here is sooo good!

title: Fantastic
text: the rices for under 2s were great...there were so many! We got there at a good time so there were no queues.
place: Chessington World of Adventures Resort - 1 Day Admission Ticket

title: fantastic
text: Amazing!!! We had the best time ever here!!! The food was great...drinks were a little slow. Our starters arrived before the mains. Other than that, it was fab. The lavender loaf is an absolute must!

title: Great
text: This is a super interesting place! The historical aspect of it was amazing. It was a shame that we didn't have an audio guide. We used and app called Rick Steves Audio Europe. It is free and takes you through step by step giving interesting information. We visited the museum after which was also good.

title: Great
text: We visited rhe museum after visiting the Acropolis itself. It is an interesting museum - lots of artifacts and explanations. I wouldn't say all children would enjoy it - it's not very interactive.

title: Great fun
text: This cave is really interesting. It was great to see what has happened over thousands of years. The guides are also very helpful and knowledgable. A must visit!!

title: Great experience
text: My family and I had a lovely time here! You don't get a huge amount of time is the cave but inside, it is just magical! A must if you are in Kefalonia!!!

title: Great restaurant
text: We had a great meal here. The service, food and wine is great! The restaurant has great views of the ocean! We had calamari, seabass, octopus and chocolate cake with ice cream for dessert. Scrummy!! A must visit!! For the quality, the price is very reasonable!!

title: Yummm
text: This place does yummy kebabs! We had a chicken shish and chips! It was quick and tasted goooood! There are some bad reviews here but we thought the food was good.

title: Fantastic
text: My fiancè and I stayed here for our anniversary. We loved it. The location is great. The service was Tim was great - he had great tips and was very helpful. Thank you so much. We will be back soon! :)

title: Great fun
text: We visited as a family. It was great fun! Our clubs were well sanitised and everything was clean. We will be back!

title: Great
text: My family of 6 visited here for my brother's 15th birthday. The food and service was great. We each had a set menu. It was great food! It was all very flavoursome and not greasy. The service was friendly and helpful. Thank you and we will be back soon!!

title: simply amazing
text: We loved this place! The menu has great choice....we simply could not choose! We asked the waiter who recommended us the Cruasacean platter. He told us just to get that and nof starters. He was right. It was the most delicious seafood we have ever had! The service is also great...very attentive, helpful and warm. We will be back when we are next in Weymouth!

title: Food great, service slow
text: The food at Al Molo is 5/5. We had the squid starter which was yummy, and the pork belly which was also good. For mains, we had the lamb tortelinni and halibut. Both were great! We give the service 3/5. When we got there, they did not have a table for us. We waited wondering if it would be possible even though we had booked. It was our anniversary so we were quite worried - I had added this to the booking email. We mentioned that we had a 20% off voucher...we realised the waitress had not used the voucher once we had paid which was annoying. We sat down after 10 minutes and were asked if we wanted some water. 10 minutes later, we were asked again if we wanted water by our waitress. After that, the service was slow...we were often waiting to order. We thought our first drinks might have been free due to us not getting a table and having to wait. Though the waitress was friendlg and helpful, it was slow. We would come back if we knew the service was better.

title: Delicious!!!
text: It's the scind time I had ice cram from here! This time, I had the dolce de leche and kinda bueno...it was delcious. I recommend you go here instead of somewhere else. The service is not the quickest (Covid social distancing) but it is well worth the wait! Highly recommend!! Cannot wait to return!

title: Nice!
text: This is a good place to grab some tapas, drinks and people watch. It is in a great location. They have a range of good wines and an extensive menu. We had the goats cheese parcels with marmelade and huevos rotas (eggs with chips). My friend was vegetarian and they were happy to help her decide what to have a tweak some food so it had no meat on. The food was a littke cold but tasted good. Thanks guys!

title: great
text: My friend and I visited this hotek for one night. It was a great price and had everhthing we needed!! It is jn a great location. The receptionists are also very helpful and soeak good English. During Covid, it was great to see that they were taking things seriously - everything was clean and many things had a disinfectant sticker on. As we walked into the room, it smelt so clean! Thanks guys!

title: Yummy!!
text: Tasty lunch! Both of us had the chicken kofta. It was delicious! I mustvisit more because the food, service and views are great!

title: Very interesting
text: The caves are so interesting! The audio guide is great and takes you through the cave giving you interesting information. We walked up to see the views after - not a hard walk and a beautiful view from the top! If you are in Nerja, I would definitely visit. During Covid, it was hard to get a bus...we got a taxi which was unsure €10. A bus back to Nerja was under €2.

title: Great!!!
text: This is a great Mexican! The cocktails are great (strong and tasty), the food is delicious (filling) and service is good. We had the veggie nachos to start, veggie fajitas and the tasting platter (unsure of the name). It was all very tasty. For us, it was a bit too much food so consider ordering just a main if you are not starving or a big eater! It was busy but the service was still good. A must visit if you love Mexican food!!

title: Hisgorical
text: Although it was closed due to Covid 19, it was interesting to look at. It would be great to know more!

title: Great
text: We only had a drink and some padron peppers. They were yummy. The eatery is in a good location and everything was clean.

title: Lovely stay
text: This hotel is really lovely. The people working on thd front desks were very helpful. The hotel was very clean and great quality for what we paid! The location is also great...close to the beach and main town with restaurants and bars. Thank you so much.

title: Not great
text: I visited with friends visited for dumplings on a Sunday. I visited a couple of years ago and loved it but it was a huge change when I visited a couple of weeks ago! The pastry on all the dumplings was so thick, the filling in the dumplings was mushy and bland, the meat in the rice wrapped in leaves was slimey and the service was cold (not friendly). I hate leaving bad reviews but I really hope this restaurant pulls its socks up soon because when I have been in the past, it really was delicious! Hopefully next time will be better...

title: Great fun at a great bar!!
text: I visitied here for my friend's birthday. The cocktail menu is great - a range of really interesting cocktails. My friend didn't like one of her cocktails. A waiter kindly swapped it for us. We were there on a Satirday night and there was a great pianist playing. He took songs we wanted to play and played them and sand them. It was a great night and we will be back.

title: Fantastic, authentic Spanish food
text: The food here is delicious. We have been to Spain many times and would say this food is just like the food we have had in Spain! The service is also friendly and very helpful. We will be back! :)

title: Fantastic food!
text: Fantastic food! We had the chicken skewer and saffron rice with a mixed salad - all was delicious and really healthy! We will be back. The service is also great. Thank you so much :))

title: Always yummy
text: Love this place. The food is always so so tasty!! I had a noodle dish and a coke on this visit and my friend had a rice dish. The only things I would say about this place is that the food comes at different times - surely it can be done at the same time? This is the only restaurant I know of that does this. Because it comes at different times, the food either goes cold while you wait for the other dishes or one person sits awquardly waiting fod their dish. The other thing is the staff push you to but more. I feel like this is done a little too much.

title: Great fun
text: I literally love this place! It is a lovely place to come for a drink, food and watch a good movie! The decor is great. The service on the front desk is good but a little slow as there was only one person on it. I would return soon but notice that the films can be quite samey and tend to be older films - are there any newer ones we could watch? I had a great time though and will return soon!

title: Such a shame
text: Good food, slow service and rude staff. We went here on a Sunday. It took a while for us to order - several times we tried to get the attention from a waiter or waitress. The food took a while to come but was really tasty. Before we had even finished, the staff started to take our plates away. We were shocked that 12.5% service charge was added. We decided not to pay it because we did not think the service was good enough. The waiter returned our money and bill and said that we had no paid enough. We explained that we had not paid the service charge. He seemed a little annoyed at this. When leaving, no staff said goodbye or smiled. Duck Duck Goose need to think about what good service it. That said, if the service improved, I would return as the food is good.

title: Delicious Sunday roast!!
text: I visited here a few weeks ago with my girlfriends. 3 of us had the roast and it was sooooo soooooo yummy!! It was a good price too I will definitely be back again soon!

title: Great bar! Great view! Great food!
text: We visited here one day in February. The food was delicious. It is very nicely places - on the marina with stunning views. We had a ham and cheese crepe each. We stayed here for quite a while watching the football. The waiting staff couldn't do enough for us. Thank you guys!

title: Delicious meal
text: We visited here and had lunch while we were viewing wedding venues. The food is delicious! We had the Portugese seafood stew (can't remember the name of it). The wine was also very good. The view from the restaurant is so beautiful! It is next door to the Praia Verde Club - a luxury venues with a gorgeous view, lovely pool and bar. Thank you to all the friendly waiting staff for a lovely experience.

title: A lovely stay
text: This hotel is really lovely. The service is good, it has gorgeous pools and is very clean. The hotel is just outside the Old Town which has lots of lovely bars and restaurants. There were a couple of annoying this that I found from our 3 day stay. Firstly, you have to wear swimming hats in the indoor pool. We were not away of this so had to buy them for €5 each. If the hotel wants everyone to wear swimming hats, why not provide them? Also, we had to pay €2 to use a locker. Silly. Secondly, we had to pay for wifi. It was not expensibe but for a 4 star hotel, I really do think this should be included. Other than these two things, the hotel is really nice and I would probably stay again. Tip for young familes/ older people - there are a lot of steps to walk to get to the old town with the bars and restaurants.

title: Amazing meal!
text: Oh myyyy! This place's peri peri chicken is pit of this world! We had 1/2 a chicken, chips, salad, 1/2 a litre of white wine, 2 beers and 1 dessert. It came to €30. It is great value! The mango mouse is also delicious - a very refreshing way to end a meal. Thank you to our amazing waiter William for his friendly service - a lovely man! We will definitely be back when we are next in town!

title: Great fun!
text: Great fun! We visited on a Thursday evening! It was great fun...there was live music which was very entertaining and the drink options were good too. We will be back!!

title: Quality yummy food
text: My fiancè and I went here for breakfast. He had a toastie and I had the English breakfastm the food was delicous. In total, it cam to €14 including a large coke each. Great value! We will be back

title: Good fun
text: Great fun! Visited here to see a magic show. It was a super show and many acts were funny too with amazing tricks! The theatre is small and has great atmosphere with a good bar and food. We will be back!

title: A great evening
text: We visited one Tuesday evening to see the panto. It was great fun! They have a great little bar, friendly staff and a great range of shows at good prices! Can't wait to visit again soon

title: Great food
text: I visited here one Tuesday evening. The food was so tasty! Everything was freshly cooked and the chicken was very juicy! I will be back!

title: A shame
text: We visited for a bottemless brunch on Saturday. The place has real character and a good atmosphere. Sadly, the food was average, the bubbly was flat, the service to get more drinks was very slow (at one point we asked 3 times in 15 minutes) and the staff are pretty rude and not too friendly. I probably wouldb't return. It's sad because for such a fun looking place, everything elss lets it down. I probably wouldn't return.

title: Great food!
text: Great tapas and a beautiful restaurant. Thank you for a lovely evening We will definitely be back!

title: Great basketball
text: We visited Surrey Sport Park to watch the basketball. It was great fun! The seating area is great and the vibe during the game as awesome! The park has great facilities including a bar that sells food. The staff are friendly and helpful. I would definitely visit if you are a sports fan!!!

title: A lovely pub
text: This pub is lovely and cosy. We only had a drink here but enjoyed our relaxing time. The service was also friendly. Thank you. The food also looked really yummy! We will have that next time.

title: Great cosy bar
text: We just had a few drinks in the bar a wonder through the hotel. The bar is so cute and cosy. The service was friendly and helpful. We will be back when we are back in town. The hotel is lovely - it seems exoensive but it is so nice. Thank you so much.

title: Amazing meal
text: We visited The Mulberry Restaurant. Everything was perfect. We had pigeon and rabbit wellington to start, lamb and venison for mains and cheese and the chocolate tarte for dessert. Everything was so delicious. The wine was great too and the small nibbles between each course was a lovely, yummy touch. The service was also great - everyone was friendly and helpful. We will be back when we are next in town. Thank you so much.
place: Mulberry Restaurant at The Manor House

title: Great food and fun!
text: Great burgers with and cheesey chips with gravy. The chips came a little cold. Other than that, it was super yummy and the service was great!

title: Great burgers
text: Great burgers with and cheesey chips with gravy. The chips came a little cold. Other than that, it was super yummy and the service was great!

title: Delicious Christmas burgers!!
text:
We visited Byron just last week. Everything was spot on. We both had the 'All Hail the Turkey' burger with the onion gravy and fries. They were delicious burgers and are a must at this time of year! They are basicalpy buttermilk chicken with, bread sauce, cranberry sauce and stuffing - what more could you want inna Christmas burger?
We also had the halloumi fries and Christmas baubles (macaroni cheese balls topped with bacon, blue cheess sauce and cranberry sauce) to start - so so yummy! Thank you Daniel and Mantas for the great, friendly service! We will be back asap :D

title: A real shame!
text: Always loved this place but this visit was a shame! After waiting10 minutes, we sat down. We were asked to order straight away. The drinks and food came promptly. The food wasn't hot but it was so busy, we didn't bother saying anything. My pizza was a margarite with Italian ham on. There was little to no cheese on it which was a shame. Once we had finished, we were given the bill and 5 minutes later asked if we wanted to pay by card. We said we hadn't finished our drinks yet so didn't want to pay yet. We got a simple 'okay' reply back. The whold thing was very rushed - they just wanted us in and out so more customers could sit down. This is a shame as I've always enjoyed myself so much at Pizza Pilgrims. Better luck next time!

title: Great prosecco, good food.
text: Great bottemless brunch. They are very good with their prosecco - always topping it up snd for £18 per person, you can't go wrong! The food is good but not brilliant. I would go again.

title: Great!
text: This place does yummy food! We all had a Turkish kebab. The yoguty suace they put on it is so delicous!! We went at 11.30 at nuggt and they still served us with a smile :) Is was a delicious experience!!

title: Good but could be better
text: I went here over Folk Week. We booked luckily as it was busy. The mains were great - we all had the burger. Yummy! We had desserts also. The chocolate bomb was disappointing as the sauce wasn't hot enough to melt the bomb. The honeycomb cheesecake tasted like it had come from a supermarket - nkt very fresh. It was a shame because the mains were so good!! When we ordered our desserts, we ordered more cocktails. These didn't arrive. It seemed like the cocktails and the waitress had got lost. We went to the bar to have the drinks taken off the bill. The manager was happy to do so but didn't apologise - he seemed too busy to care about this. Unsure if I would return. We had nice burgers though.

title: Good but expensive
text: I went here over Folk Week. They had live music which was good and the general atmosphere was nice. The drinks were very expensive. £7 so a single gin is crazy. A nice pub though. I would return but have a coke instead to drink.
place: The Charles Dickens Seaside Gastro Pub & Restaurant

title: Great food and friendly people!
text: Great food! I went here for a family meal - there were 7 of us. The food is a great! Big portions. We had the taglitelle, scampi, battered fish, seafood pizza and ham egg and chips. All were delicious! Would return! The pub also has an interesting ramge of gins. Thank you xx
